==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Japanese-coined (kokuji, [[国字]]).

{{Han compound|山|上|下|ls=ic}} – going up 上 a mountain 山 and down 下 the other side.

Compare [[裃]], [[垰]], [[𠱚]], [[卡]].
